name: Digging Deeper
description: While you work in a mine to extract minerals, a landslide occurs and the only exit to the outside is blocked. Fortunately, the professionals begin a rescue by introducing a Phoenix capsule to extract the survivors located in the 'refuge' room. As the capsule begins to descend, another collapse occurs, preventing the capsule from continuing its journey. You are the miner who knows the dark caves best, you must clear the path of the capsule in order to survive this terrible nightmare.
